com.archql.labs.householddevices

Class Kettle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.archql.labs.householddevices.Device
      • com.archql.labs.householddevices.Kettle

  • public class Kettle
extends Device
    class Kettle that holds general information of a Kettle device property power refers to a power consumption in watts property material refers to its material property hasWhistle whether kettle has a whistle installed property color refers to color
    See Also:
    to learn about base class
